info.description: RESTful API of tixkitz ticket systeme
info.title: LOKET TIKET

post.description: Create a new movie with poster and backdrop upload, genres and casts as JSON arrays.

parameters.description: JSON array of genre IDs as string: [12,14,18]
parameters.name: genres

parameters.description: JSON array of cast IDs as string: [1,2,3]
parameters.name: casts

400.description: Bad request, e.g. invalid input or file upload error

500.description: Internal server error, e.g. binding failure

get.description: complete list of movies from the database

delete.description: soft delete a movie from the database using id

post.description: Authenticates user by verifying email and password. Returns a JWT access token upon success.

delete.description: Logout user with blacklist to redis

post.description: Register a new user with email and password

get.description: Retrieve all available cinema schedules from the server

200.description: Schedules fetched successfully or no schedules available

500.description: Internal server error while fetching the schedule

get.description: Retrieve all available seats for a specific cinema schedule

parameters.description: The ID of the cinema schedule
parameters.name: schedule_id

200.description: Available seats retrieved successfully or no seats available

500.description: Internal server error while fetching available seats

get.summary: get movie with filter by name and genre with pagination

get.description: get list of movies where popularity higher than 40
Get list of movies with release date later than the current date
get movie detail based from id
Retrieve available movie schedules based on movie ID, date, time, and location.

parameters.description: Filter by time (HHMM in 24h format, e.g. 2030)
parameters.name: time

get.description: movie schedules (date, time, location, cinema) for a given movie ID

get.summary: get user profile info based from ID

patch.description: Update user's profile details via multipart form
patch.summary: Update user profile info by ID

400.description: Invalid user ID or no user found

get.summary: get user order history info based from ID

204.description: No order history found for user

patch.description: allows user's to update their password

400.description: bad request - validation failed or user not found
